verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: meets] [ARG1: with the President of France , Emmanuel Macron ,] [ARGM-LOC: at the G-7 Summit in Quebec] . The two say that they have had open and direct discussions and are hoping for a positive outcome .
